name: Epoch Of Fire
description:
In this retro top down bullet-heck action game, play as young tribe member Cupun who’s been chosen by his people to be sacrificed for the good of the people.

Steal the flame-bearing inneqstone, escape the underworld, and bring the stone back to your people to restore fire to the world before your whole village dies of hypothermia.

But death is not the end for you. Die and you may battle your way out of the underworld. Just don’t let anyone or anything shatter the stone! The better you take care of the stone, the more optimistic your village's fate will be.

Controls:
WASD – Move
SPACE – Attack, Deflect Projectiles, Advance Dialogue
E – Revive from Underworld

Credits:
Laxai – Programmer
Evan Robert Barber – Writer and Narrative Designer
Kinkinkijkin – Artist, Enemy & Level Designer

Made for the Retro Jam 8
